title: Young-onset colon adenocarcinoma masquerading as acute appendicitis
details: BN Kowalczyk, J Paek, V Bansal - Radiology Case Reports, 2024
abstract: This case report presents the findings of colon adenocarcinoma in a young adult male who presented with vague abdominal pain as his only complaint, suspicious of appendicitis. The patient underwent abdominal computed tomography (CT) imaging …
